languages.text: Левый борт был охвачен страшным пожаром, угрожавшим подрывом арсенальных камер главного калибра.
The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.
languages.original_text: Левый борт был охвачен страшным пожаром, угрожавшим подрывом арсенальных камер главного калибра.

traits.locale_text: The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the arsenal chambers of the main caliber.
The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.
The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.
The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.

languages.text: 左側は恐ろしい火に包まれ、メインキャリバーの武器庫を脅かしていた。
languages.original_text: The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.

traits.locale_text: 左側は恐ろしい火に包まれ、メインキャリバーの武器庫を脅かしていた。

languages.text: Le côté gauche a été victime d'un terrible incendie, qui menaçait d'engloutir à son tour l'arsenal.
languages.original_text: The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.

traits.locale_text: Le côté gauche a été victime d'un terrible incendie, qui menaçait d'engloutir à son tour l'arsenal.

languages.text: 舰船左侧起了一场可怕的大火，可能会引爆主弹药库。
languages.original_text: The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.

traits.locale_text: 舰船左侧起了一场可怕的大火，可能会引爆主弹药库。

languages.text: Al ala izquierda la aquejaba un terrible incendio, que amenazaba con socavar las cámaras del arsenal de mayor calibre.
languages.original_text: The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.

traits.locale_text: Al ala izquierda la aquejaba un terrible incendio, que amenazaba con socavar las cámaras del arsenal de mayor calibre.

languages.text: Auf der linken Seite tobte ein schreckliches Feuer, das drohte, die Kammern des Hauptarsenals zu untergraben.
languages.original_text: The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.

traits.locale_text: Auf der linken Seite tobte ein schreckliches Feuer, das drohte, die Kammern des Hauptarsenals zu untergraben.

languages.text: İskele tarafı, ana kalibre cephaneliklerini tehdit eden şiddetli bir yangında alevlere boğulmuştu.
languages.original_text: The left side was engulfed in a terrible fire, threatening to undermine the main-calibre arsenal chambers.

traits.locale_text: Sol tarafta şiddetli bir yangın çıktı. Ana kalibre silah depolarını içine alma tehlikesi var.
